mapper.select: SELECT A.ACCOUNTID as accId , A.NAME as name , TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(A.REGISTERDATE) as regDate , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url FROM ACCOUNT A RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON A.ACCOUNTID = P.ACCOUNTID WHERE A.ACCOUNTID = #{accId} AND P.URL = '/static/account/upload'
SELECT BUYSTATUS as buyStatus , COUNT(*) as buyCnt FROM BOARD WHERE BUYSTATUS = #{accId} GROUP BY BUYSTATUS

SELECT B.BID as bId , B.BTITLE as bTitle , B.PRICE as price , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url FROM BOARD B RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON B.BID = P.BID WHERE B.BUYSTATUS = #{accId} ORDER BY B.CREATEDATE DESC

SELECT B.BID as bId , B.BTITLE as bTitle , B.PRICE as price , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url , F.ACCOUNTID as accId FROM BOARD B RIGHT JOIN FAVORITE F ON B.BID = F.BID RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON B.BID = P.BID WHERE F.ACCOUNTID = #{accId} ORDER BY B.CREATEDATE DESC
SELECT BUYSTATUS , COUNT(*) AS sellCnt FROM BOARD WHERE ACCOUNTID = '1' AND BUYSTATUS IS NOT NULL GROUP BY BUYSTATUS

SELECT A.ACCOUNTID as accId , A.NAME as name , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url , A.VISITCNT AS visitCnt FROM ACCOUNT A RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON A.ACCOUNTID = P.ACCOUNTID WHERE A.ACCOUNTID = #{accId} AND P.URL = '/static/account/upload'

SELECT B.BID as bId , B.BTITLE as bTitle , CONCAT(P.URL, '/' || P.UUIDNAME) as url , B.PRICE as price FROM BOARD B RIGHT JOIN PHOTOUPLOAD P ON B.BID = P.BID WHERE B.ACCOUNTID = #{accId} AND BUYSTATUS IS NULL
SELECT PROFILEID , ACCOUNTID as accId , VISITED , LATEST_VISITED_DATE AS latestVisit FROM PROFILE_STATICS WHERE ACCOUNTID = #{accId}
